SELECT media_order AS mediaOrder ,media_title AS mediaTitle ,thumbnail_img_nm AS thumbnailImgNm ,thumbnail_origin_file_nm AS thumbnailOriginFileNm ,thumbnail_img_file_path AS thumbnailImgFilePath ,media_price AS mediaPrice ,ad_detail_category AS adDetailCategory ,T3.nickname AS nickname ,T2.region AS region ,T2.ad_category AS adCategory FROM adin_media_register T1 LEFT JOIN adin_media_introduce T2 ON T1.email = T2.email LEFT JOIN adin_user T3 ON T1.email = T3.email WHERE 1=1 AND ad_detail_category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{adDetailCategoryKo}, '%') AND T2.ad_category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{adCategoryKo}, '%') AND (T2.region LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionKo}, '%') OR T2.region = '전국') LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
